TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentDesigner extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ComponentDesigner Implements IComponentInitializer, IDesigner, IDesignerFilter, IDisposable, ITreeDesigner
type ComponentDesigner = class interface ITreeDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IDesignerFilter interface IComponentInitializer

summary.span: 扩展组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本设计器类提供了一个简单的设计器，可以扩展设计模式中的关联组件的行为。The base designer class provides a simple designer that can extend the behavior of an associated component in design mode. 提供了一个空接口的实现，可以重写其方法以在设计时调整属性、 属性和关联组件的事件。 provides an empty interface implementation, whose methods can be overridden to adjust the attributes, properties and events of the associated component at design time. 可以将设计器关联的类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design-time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). 类实现继承的组件的属性说明符的特殊行为。The class implements a special behavior for the property descriptors of inherited components. 名为的内部类型`InheritedPropertyDescriptor`默认情况下使用实现来代替继承自基类的属性。An internal type named `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` is used by the default implementation to stand in for properties that are inherited from a base class. 有两种情况下，在其中添加这些属性描述符。There are two cases in which these property descriptors are added. 1. 根对象本身，这由属性，因为从其基类继承。To the root object itself, which is returned by the property, because you are inheriting from its base class. 2. 找到根对象的基类中的字段。To fields found in the base class of the root object. 从基类的公共和受保护字段添加到设计器，以便它们可以由用户操作。Public and protected fields from the base class are added to the designer so that they can be manipulated by the user. `InheritedPropertyDescriptor`类修改的属性，默认值，以便默认值是在实例化对象的当前值。The `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` class modifies the default value of a property, so that the default value is the current value at object instantiation. 这是因为属性继承自另一个实例。This is because the property is inherited from another instance. 在设计器定义的属性值重置为继承的类将其设置为值的设置。The designer defines resetting the property value as setting it to the value that was set by the inherited class. 此值可能不同于存储在元数据中的默认值。This value may differ from the default value stored in metadata. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例实现和使用设计器关联的组件示例。The following code example provides an example implementation and an example component associated with the designer. 在设计器实现的重写方法调用了基`Initialize`方法中，重写显示的方法双击，该组件时且的重写提供的自定义的属性访问器到组件的快捷菜单的菜单命令。The designer implements an override of the method that calls the base `Initialize` method, an override of the method that displays a when the component is double-clicked, and an override of the property accessor that supplies a custom menu command to the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CPP/examplecomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CS/examplecomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/VB/examplecomponent.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 获取与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示要复制或移动设计器在复制期间所管理的组件以及任何组件拖动，或移动操作。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果此集合包含对当前的设计模式文档中的其他组件的引用，这些组件将复制以及设计器在复制操作期间所管理的组件。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 选择设计器所管理的组件，此集合被填充任何嵌套的控件。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合还可以包含其他组件，如工具栏的按钮。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的设置此属性。The method of sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 重写时方法，请务必调用基类方法，然后再使用此属性。When overriding the method, be sure to call the base class method before using this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在源代码文件中为组件的默认事件创建方法签名，并将用户的光标定位到该位置。

span.span: Creates a method signature in the source code file for the default event on the component and navigates the user's cursor to that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体设计器中，当用户双击一个组件时调用此方法。In Windows Forms and Web Forms designers, this method is invoked when a user double-clicks a component.

exception.span: 签出已签入源代码管理程序的文件的尝试失败。

span.span: An attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将对象回收之前，尝试通过调用 来释放资源。

span.span: Attempts to free resources by calling before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写并通过调用清除资源`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 重新初始化现有组件。

span.span: Reinitializes an existing component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在重新初始化现有组件时调用方法。The method is called when an existing component is being reinitialized. 例如，这可能会发生用户将一个组件拖动到另一个容器。For example, this may occur after the user drags a component to another container. 可以使用`defaultValues`字典以应用推荐的默认值为属性; 但是，您不应修改组件属性，除了存储在字典中，因为此现有组件可能已对其设置的属性。You may use the `defaultValues` dictionary to apply recommended defaults to properties; however, you should not modify component properties aside from those stored in the dictionary, because this existing component may already have properties set on it. 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

span.span: Initializes a newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件第一次初始化时，通常首先添加到设计图面后调用方法。The method is called when a component is first initialized, typically after being first added to a design surface. 你可能会执行任何必要的初始化此组件，并可能会忽略`defaultValues`字典完全。You may perform any necessary initialization of this component, and you may ignore the `defaultValues` dictionary altogether. 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

summary.span: 对已初始化为非默认设置的导入组件的设置进行初始化。

span.span: Initializes the settings for an imported component that is already initialized to settings other than the defaults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当与不在其默认状态下，如粘贴或移动到设计器拖放操作使用的控件的控件关联设计器时，调用此方法。This method is called when the designer is associated with a control that is not in its default state, such as a control that you paste or move with a drag-and-drop operation onto the designer. 此方法提供的实施者能修改或隐藏组件的属性而不是初始化为其默认设置组件的属性的机会。This method provides an opportunity for implementers to modify or shadow the properties of the component rather than initialize the properties for the component to their defaults. 其他初始化函数后调用此方法。This method is called after the other initialization functions.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Use InitializeNewComponent instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 设置组件的默认属性。

span.span: Sets the default properties for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化设计器时调用。 is called when the designer is initialized. 这允许设计器提供的基组件的默认值。This allows the designer to provide default values for the base component. 一次调用此方法： 当你首次创建该组件通过将其从工具箱拖动到设计图面。This method is called only once: when you first create the component by dragging it from the Toolbox to the design surface. 后续初始化设计器会调用此方法。Subsequent initializations of the designer do not invoke this method. 此方法的默认实现将该组件的默认属性设置为组件的名称，如果默认属性是一个字符串，并且尚未设置该属性。The default implementation of this method sets the default property of the component to the name of the component if the default property is a string and the property is not already set. 此方法可以实现自定义此设计器正在设计的组件初始化派生类中。This method can be implemented in a derived class to customize the initialization of the component that this designer is designing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ParentComponent As IComponent
protected: virtual property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ ParentComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此设计器的父组件。

span.span: Gets the parent component for this designer.

value.span: 此设计器的父组件，或者如果此设计器为根组件，则为 。

span.span: The parent component for this designer, or if this designer is the root component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供用于发现设计器中的父关系的通用机制，用于通过对象的接口实现。This property provides a generic mechanism for discovering parent relationships within designers, and is used by the object's interface implementation. 此属性只应返回`null`此设计器时的根组件。This property should only return `null` when this designer is the root component. 此属性的默认实现返回不是根组件的所有组件的根组件，它返回`null`根组件。The default implementation of this property returns the root component for all components that are not the root component, and it returns `null` for the root component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub PostFilterAttributes (attributes As IDictionary)
abstract member PostFilterAttributes : System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit override this.PostFilterAttributes : System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit

param.name: attributes
param.span: 组件的类的特性。

span.span: The attributes for the class of the component.

summary.span: 允许设计器从通过 公开的特性集中更改或移除项。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够更改或移除的通过公开的属性的字典中项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of attributes that are exposed through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性的值由指定的类型标识符及其属性。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 类型的对象属于。The objects are of type . 此方法后立即调用方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 可通过访问字典可以直接进行筛选参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，在执行您自己的筛选后调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，你必须删除中的项方法。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 相反，更改属性，若要隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 您可能还会删除中的项方法。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

span.span: The events for the class of the component.

summary.span: 允许设计器从通过 公开的事件集中更改或移除项。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of events that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够更改或移除的通过公开的事件的字典中项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of events that are exposed through a . 中的事件字典的关键字是事件的名称。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 类型的对象属于。The objects are of type . 此方法后立即调用方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 可通过访问字典可以直接进行筛选参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，在执行您自己的筛选后调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，你必须删除中的项方法。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 相反，更改属性，若要隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 您可能还会删除中的项方法。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法将项添加到设计器通过公开的特性的字典。This method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of attributes that a designer exposes through a . 属性的字典中的键是属性的值由指定的类型标识符及其属性。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 类型的对象属于。The objects are of type . 立即之前调用此方法方法。This method is called immediately before the method.

para.span: 可以直接修改可通过访问字典参数，或也可以将其保持不变。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取与设计器相关联的组件所支持的设计时谓词。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs supported by the component that is associated with the designer.

value.span: 对象的 ，在没有可用设计器谓词的情况下为 。

span.span: A of objects, or if no designer verbs are available.
This default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`null`如果组件没有设计时谓词。This method returns `null` if the component has no design-time verbs. 在设计时环境通常显示在快捷方式 （右键单击） 菜单中此方法返回的谓词。The design-time environment typically displays verbs returned by this method in a shortcut (right-click) menu. 当用户选择某一谓词方法的相应调用。When a user selects one of the verbs, the method of the corresponding is invoked. > [!NOTE] > 设计时环境通常会提供**属性**组件的快捷菜单上的命令。A design-time environment typically provides a **Properties** command on a component's shortcut menu. 因此，不包括的这一项中的设计器指定谓词的集合。Therefore, do not include such an entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
